Package pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract Class designed for all Pieces on the Chess Board It has all the basic methods and variables required to make pieces function
Since:
2022-03-22
Version:
1.0
Author:
Afaq Qamar (aq101), Suryateja Gandhesiri (sg1571)

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int enPassTurn
    The enPassTurn variable tracks which player's turn it is so enpassante is done correctly 1 - white turn, 2- black turn

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Piece​(java.lang.String type, boolean team)
    Default Constructor for Piece, It creates an Instance of the piece and sets all the variables to default values

  • Field Details

    • enPassTurn

      public int enPassTurn
      The enPassTurn variable tracks which player's turn it is so enpassante is done correctly 1 - white turn, 2- black turn

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece​(java.lang.String type, boolean team)
      Default Constructor for Piece, It creates an Instance of the piece and sets all the variables to default values
      Parameters:
      type - The type of piece it is
      team - The team the piece belongs to (true for White, false for Black)

  • Method Details

    • getTeam

      public boolean getTeam()
      This method gets the Team the piece is part of
      Returns:
      boolean The piece's team true if white false otherwise

    • didMove

      public boolean didMove()
      This method checks if the Piece moved or not
      Returns:
      boolean Whether or not the piece moved or not : true if the piece moved false otherwise

    • setMove

      public boolean setMove​(boolean didMove)
      This method sets the Piece move to true if the piece moved false otherwise
      Parameters:
      didMove - tracks whether or not the piece moved
      Returns:
      boolean true if the piece moved false otherwise

    • getEnpassant

      public boolean getEnpassant()
      This method gets the value of the Piece's enpassant
      Returns:
      boolean true if enpassant is possible false otherwise

    • setEnpassant

      public boolean setEnpassant​(boolean en_passantable)
      This method sets the value of the Piece's enpassant
      Parameters:
      en_passantable - true or false
      Returns:
      boolean true if enpassant is possible false otherwise

    • getType

      public java.lang.String getType()
      This method gets the type of the Piece
      Returns:
      String the Piece's type i.e Rook, King, Bishop etc.

    • getEnPassTurn

      public int getEnPassTurn()
      This method gets the type of the Piece
      Returns:
      int The turn of the user 1 for White 2 for Black turn

    • move

      public abstract boolean move​(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      Abstract method to move the Pieces depending on what it is
      Parameters:
      oldPos - The oldPos of the piece
      newPos - The newPos of the piece
      Returns:
      boolean true if the piece moved false otherwise

    • isPathClear

      public abstract boolean isPathClear​(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      Abstract method to check if the Pieces path is clear
      Parameters:
      oldPos - The oldPos of the piece
      newPos - The newPos of the piece
      Returns:
      boolean true if the piece path is clear false otherwise

    • isMoveValid

      public abstract boolean isMoveValid​(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      Abstract method to check if the Pieces move is valid
      Parameters:
      oldPos - The oldPos of the piece
      newPos - The newPos of the piece
      Returns:
      boolean true if the piece move is valid false otherwise
